pr_title: Always send full last known version, including id.

timeline.message: Always send full last known version, including id.

timeline.bodyText: Thinking about this a bit more: I think this is a change in behavior, in that every startTransactions call now will cause timelock to compute a snapshot, until we have an impl.
timeline.author: jkozlowski

replies.bodyText: I guess snapshotting right now is cheap since there aren't actually going to be events, but this could lead to unintended consequences later on. It seems safer to return Optional.of(FAKE)? - you still take a snapshot when there's a leader election, but that's relatively uncommon
replies.author: jeremyk-91

replies.bodyText: Exactly, I think snapshotting is cheap so I shouldn't worry about it.
replies.author: jkozlowski

replies.bodyText: Returning FAKE is same as Optional.empty, see impl. So I don't mind, I'll revert it.
replies.author: jkozlowski
